name: Design System Contribution Template
description:
A template for designers to work through some common steps in contributing to a design system:


Audit

  • Assess your own product as well as other design systems for similar or existing patterns that will influence your work

Ideation

  • Explore different directions, invite feedback from your peers, and refine to a solution

Proposal

  • Get into the specifics and document the component's usage, how it relates to the rest of your system, and identify the final design direction for the component.
